C. 1.5 percent

D. 0.1 percent

E. 0.2 percent

F. 0.3 percent

G. 0.5 percent

H. 5 percent

I. 0.02 percent

J. 0.05 percent

The other half is diluted 1:10^5 and plated on strain K. Four plaques are found on K and 40 are found on B. G. 0.5 percent

I. 0.02 percent
